name: Lunar Restoration: The Plague of Time
name_original: Lunar Restoration: The Plague of Time
description:
Oh no! The moon* has broken into fifty-six pieces! Within twenty seconds, it is your job to repair the moon before the Earth is overcome by the tide. Don't worry about finishing before time is up; you'll be scored depending on how many pieces you manage to put back. Try to get the highest possible score!

*not flat earth propaganda 

Created for Global Game Jam 2020 by:

Nicole LoBue 

Nick La Costa 

Olivia Elmers

 Jess Case
